mapper.select: SELECT pa.pallet_id, pa.load, pa.width, pa.depth, pa.height, pa.destination, pa.vehicle_number FROM `pallet` pa LEFT JOIN `vehicle` v ON pa.vehicle_number = v.vehicle_number WHERE (#{destination} IS NULL OR pa.destination = #{destination}) AND (#{vehicleNumber} IS NULL OR v.vehicle_number = #{vehicleNumber}) LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `pallet` pa LEFT JOIN `vehicle` v ON pa.vehicle_number = v.vehicle_number WHERE (#{destination} IS NULL OR pa.destination = #{destination}) AND (#{vehicleNumber} IS NULL OR v.vehicle_number = #{vehicleNumber})
